name: DrD2StatusMarkers
description:
Designed for use only with the Draci Doupe II sheet.

This script sets token markers based on relevant sheet attributes.
Works with the DrD2 token marker set, icons must be named `RED`, `BLU`, `GRN`, `VIO`, `BLK`, `GRY`.
You can download the token marker set [here](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nesuprachy/roll20-character-sheets/Draci-doupe-II/Draci%20doupe%20II/assets/DrD2-token_markers.zip).
